body: Nah bro she's trash. Not worth a dime.
Idk the blowjob seems more like a gesture of gratitude than revenge @Makerath

@Cuneta Lol. The girl dumped her childhood friend and immediately went into a relationship with a guy because of his looks and money, leaving her childhood friend broken hearted. She didn't even try to let him down nicely, she was a complete cunt about it. And it looks like she still didn't love him. She offered a blowjob for getting some revenge. Hardly a romantic gesture. 

IDGAF if she got raped, she's an mean-spirited whore. Quit being a mangina.

Fuck this is a good one I can understand everyone opinion but I want a part 2 where the girl realized her feeling for the boy but the guy think that after what happen he was just a sec friend of her childhood friend so he start dating another girl but the childhood friends want them to breakup and etc etc

Okay now that I have an account to comment here: what's wrong with you, guys? She got raped by the guy she liked and trusted. She's not a whore at all. In fact, I'm glad she realized she loved her childhood friend and the other asshole got arrested. I feel that ending make the story somewhat vanilla.
The slut got what was coming to her. Whore.
Still a slut to the end
